name: HYUP!
description:
HYUP! was made in a week by Grayson Evans  (@soft_rumpus)

Controls - left and right arrow keys 

TAB - restart

The game keeps track of your highscore until you close the game.

feel free to tweet me your highscore!  (@soft_rumpus)

my highest is 40,  after that your in gods hands. 

free sounds from:

https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/484267/
